# edgesWithoutContentMargins

**Instance Property**

The portions of a photo picker’s permiter that are borderless.

## Declaration

```swift
var edgesWithoutContentMargins: NSDirectionalRectEdge? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property updates the photos picker configuration ([doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct]) property [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHPickerConfiguration-swift.struct/edgesWithoutContentMargins].
